goals__remit: CLIA Europe represents the leading cruise companies operating in Europe. CLIA Europe is the European section of Cruise Lines International Association (CLIA), the world's largest cruise industry trade association with representation in North and South America, Europe, Asia and Australasia. CLIA represents the interests not only of cruise lines but also travel agents, port authorities and destinations.
